summary: San Quentin prison inmate Arnie Judlow asks his twin brother Bill and his wife Ruth to assist him in a daring escape plan.
cast: Jack Palance|Harold J. Stone|Edward Platt|Barbara Lang|Timothy Carey|John Cliff|John Close|Joe Conley|Richard H. Cutting|Jack Daly|Danny Davenport|Burt Douglas|Bill Erwin|Joel Fluellen|Michael Galloway|Duane Grey|Paul Keast|Donna Martell|Owen McGiveney|John McKee|Jimmy Ogg|House Peters Jr.|Charles Postal|Lee Roberts|John Rosser|Paul Sorensen|Olan Soule|Ted Stanhope|Amzie Strickland|Joe Turkel|Ralph Volkie|Frank Watkins
title: House of Numbers
